title: card.binary.get Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description:
Returns binary data stored in the binary storage area of the Notecard. The response to this API command first returns the JSON-formatted response object, then the binary data.

See the guide on [Sending and Receiving Large Binary Objects](/guides-and-tutorials/notecard-guides/sending-and-receiving-large-binary-objects) for best practices when using `card.binary`.

cobs.description: The size of the COBS-encoded data you are expecting to be returned (in bytes).

offset.description: Used along with `length`, the number of bytes to offset the binary payload from 0 when retrieving binary data from the binary storage area of the Notecard. Primarily used when retrieving multiple fragments of a binary payload from the Notecard.

length.description: Used along with `offset`, the number of bytes to retrieve from the binary storage area of the Notecard.

samples.title: Get All Binary Data
samples.description: Retrieve all binary data from storage area.
